backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a Vite configuration change needed for correct base paths across deployment modes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React root and loading the main TypeScript entry module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component that renders the TempleLayout without routing or additional logic.
frontend/src/assets/popupMemeImages.ts: Exports a list of meme image asset URLs using publicAssetUrl for the popup meme system.
frontend/src/components/CharacterBadge.t: Displays a fixed corner character illustration with a decorative badge plaque.
frontend/src/components/departments/Depa: Provides a morphing‑border section container with themed backgrounds, decorative corners, and dynamic typography.
frontend/src/components/departments/Inst: Aggregates all procrastination‑themed department and micromodule sections into a single sequential block.
frontend/src/components/departments/sect: Displays a badge grid of comedic procrastination achievements inside a bureaucracy‑styled section shell.
A minimal section that humorously advises users to close the site within a standard section shell.
Interactive section that displays humorous procrastination prophecies, with a random prophecy generator and static examples.
Renders a timeline of near-started tasks and a humorous failure status within a styled department section.
Displays randomized avoidance metrics like peak hours, snack ratio, and excuse index with interactive visuals.
Interactive sliders calculate a humorous 'delay constant' based on motivation, Wi-Fi speed, and snack availability.
Shows a grid of minor tasks users can 'admire' with counts tracked, emphasizing procrastinatory accomplishments.
Runs a staged trial simulation of procrastination with advancing phases and witness testimonies.
Button interaction increments an ascension count, triggers effects, and displays progression after repeated presses.
Renders a static section with a single humorous message about reconvening tomorrow.
Provides a form for submitting task‑delay excuses and shows an approval message after submission.
Implements a multi‑step confirmation button that escalates prompts before ending in an anticlimax.
Lets users donate pretend minutes, tracks total donated time, and shows a temporary confirmation.
Simulates entering deep focus only to interrupt users with a distraction prompt after a delay.
Displays humorous Wi‑Fi parables and runs a fake speed test that returns a preset result.
Shows a list of rare productivity 'miracles' and allows users to increment reaction counts for each.
Renders a humorous analytics section with fake caffeine metrics and a stylized bar chart inside a DepartmentSectionShell.
Displays a list of saved-but-unread articles with categories and mock read-time info in a grid layout.
Implements a step-based preparation ritual with progress tracking and a completion state.
Shows selectable productivity universes and reveals a result highlighting Universe C upon interaction.
Lists unfinished projects with progress percentages and hover‑revealed last‑accessed details.
Provides an about section describing mission, team, research, and accreditation in a corporate style.
Generates random distraction-themed prophecies when the user clicks a button.
Generates a random humorous excuse and displays an approval stamp animation. Uses state to show the selected excuse and delayed stamp.
Implements a Pomodoro-style timer that auto-resets at 12 seconds and briefly shows a message. Provides start and reset controls with formatted countdown.
Displays a static comedic productivity leaderboard with styled ranking entries. Highlights the user's position with special formatting.
Renders a multi-question radio quiz with predetermined results. Tracks selected answers and switches to a results view on submit.
Accepts a user deadline and reveals a playful quantum-themed excuse after calculation. Shows formatted date and humorous 'infinite time' message.
Shows a themed page about procrastination cycles across reincarnations. Contains humorous descriptions and stylized sections.
Simulates attempting access to a vault that always denies entry. Toggles between initial prompt and denial message with a retry button.
Renders a section with an accordion of humorous focus tips inside a styled department shell.
Displays digital commandments and a parable using accordions, with scroll depth state and decorative background.
Allows selecting joke self‑help courses and entering a name for a mock graduation ceremony with optional diploma display.
Shows a button to increment snack blessings and displays the total after the first click.
Provides multiple themed meme sections, each showing an image and humorous text inside department shells.
Cycles through three humorous meditation steps with a button to advance or restart.
Displays and increments a counter of 'emotional tabs' with themed styling and lore text.
Renders a humorous list of procrastination-themed terms and conditions inside a DepartmentSectionShell using scrollable sections.
Implements a UI for calculating the next rounded start time and running a resettable countdown timer within a themed section.
Displays a static, stylized depiction of how deadlines shift forward in time with no way back.
Shows a mock courtroom scene where a deadline accusation results in a verdict of postponement.
frontend/src/components/departments/Unne: Renders a list of extra appendix‑style departments related to humorous productivity themes.
frontend/src/components/FramedMedia.tsx: Animated scroll frame that progressively reveals four humorous commandments.
frontend/src/components/HeadlineBlock.ts: Renders the main welcome headline, subheading, and introductory message.
frontend/src/components/InfiniteRepeatBl: Repeats its children infinitely using a sentinel trigger for scroll-based block generation.
frontend/src/components/intro/CurtainInt: Provides an animated curtain overlay that blocks scroll, plays entrance/reveal animations, and unmounts after dismissal.
frontend/src/components/media/Unnecessar: Presents themed audio clips such as ASMR and chant remixes inside a stylized DepartmentSectionShell.
Renders a themed section with humorous video content, including a productivity parody and a looping candle livestream. Includes styled captions and decorative UI elements.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Ac: Displays a slide-out achievements panel showing unlocked and locked achievements. Uses a trigger button and maps achievement data into styled entries.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/AI: Provides a text‑input confession feature that displays a canned AI-style response after submission. Uses styled components and internal state to reveal the response panel.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Ap: Shows a full-screen loading overlay with themed text and animated dots. Accepts an optional message prop for customization.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Co: Generates and animates confetti particles from a given x/y coordinate, clearing them after a short duration. Uses intervals to update particle physics.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Cu: Occasionally displays fading sigh text at random screen locations. Uses timed intervals and cleanup to manage ephemeral sigh elements.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Di: Exposes a function to emit a choir sound event through the microfeature event system. Provides no UI, just an action trigger.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Fa: Shows a parody CAPTCHA modal where users select images and always fail verification. Tracks selected items and displays a failure message after attempting verification.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Ha: Renders a halo image that follows the cursor and rotates continuously. Listens to mouse movement and updates position and rotation via intervals.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Je: Displays a brief golden-flash Jesus overlay on scroll, dismissed on click or tap. Throttles scroll triggers and uses animations for fade-out effects.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Mi: Listens for microfeature events and triggers UI effects like confetti, toasts, captcha, loading overlays, and audio.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Ra: Periodically spawns floating meme images at random positions and auto-removes them after animations.
Shows rapid golden flash bursts while the user scrolls, with randomized intervals and fade effects.
frontend/src/components/microfeatures/Sc: Displays a figure overlay with a randomized productivity quote during scroll-triggered revelation sequences.
frontend/src/components/MicroHumor.tsx: Shows small humor elements including a fake productivity assessment and disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Bur: A multi-step humorous form simulating bureaucratic barriers to starting a task.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Con: Shows a step-by-step chat transcript between the user and a bot, advancing through scripted lines.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Dep: Lets users log small avoidance actions and tracks click counts with a humorous XP summary.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Emo: Displays mock emotional 'stocks' that update their values on an interval.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Exi: Renders a dramatic message about identity and productivity in a styled module shell.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Fin: Multi-tab micromodule showing terms text, glossary, myth pages, a calendar, and a simple contact response.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Gen: Simulated DNA analysis with a progress bar that reveals humorous results on completion.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Hal: Displays a grid of small achievement cards styled as humorous gold awards.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Hol: Randomly appearing tooltip that opens a dialog with rotating trivia when clicked.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Jes: Lists themed episode titles inside a styled micromodule shell.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Mat: Simple calculator-style module posing a joke math problem and revealing a humorous answer.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Mic: Common layout wrapper providing ornate styled framing and a title for micromodules.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Mir: Checkbox list for tracking small 'miracles' with a fixed probability display.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Mus: Displays merchandise items with prices and add-to-cart buttons inside a themed shell.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Nat: Shows referendum-style results comparing 'Yes' vs 'No' using progress bars.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Not: Toggles periodic random toast notifications using predefined message options.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Off: Renders a micro-module that shows a button to generate a stylized ID card with random ID text.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Pre: Displays a premium membership card listing benefits and an upgrade button.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Pro: Creates a hover-activated card that reveals a playful productivity message.
Shows a faux documentary section with styled video placeholder and narration text.
Lists themed yoga poses in a grid layout within a styled module.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Sac: Displays a mock refrigerator livestream view with a humorous message.
frontend/src/components/micromodules/Sta: Renders a portal that always declares plans start next Monday and notes if today is Monday.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingPrompt: Interactive confession form with radio options and buttons that trigger a humorous confirmation alert.
frontend/src/components/OrnateMorphingSe: A wrapper component that applies a scroll‑morphing clip‑path border and decorative visuals around its children.
frontend/src/components/TempleLayout.tsx: Main page layout assembling navigation, onboarding frames, departments, media sections, and global microfeature overlays.
frontend/src/components/TopNavBar.tsx: Renders a top navigation bar with buttons that smooth‑scroll to page sections using background imagery.
frontend/src/hooks/useAchievements.ts: Manages achievement state with localStorage persistence and provides unlock/reset helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query and identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoplayFallbackBa: Handles autoplaying looping background audio with fallback user-interaction triggers.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurtainIntroFlag.t: Tracks and stores whether an intro curtain has been dismissed using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useDualAutoplayFallba: Attempts autoplay for two layered audio tracks with interaction-based fallback and cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useInfinitePageRepeat: Implements infinite page block repetition using an intersection observer capped at three blocks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication with login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicrofeatureEvents: Implements a simple publish/subscribe system for microfeature events like confetti, toasts, and audio cues.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollActivity.ts: Tracks whether the user is currently scrolling and becomes inactive after a short timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollOrnateBorder: Maps scroll position to a morphing border shape and a continuous scroll phase value.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollTriggeredRev: Triggers cameo figures at specific scroll thresholds with reveal and fade-out behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme variables, dark mode styles, and detailed curtain animation and layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Builds asset URLs using Vite's base path to ensure correct loading in different deployment contexts.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin integrations.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Sets up Vite with React, aliasing, deployment-aware base paths, and dev server settings.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's state, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for ongoing development.
